name: "A Benihana Christmas"--"The Office" Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Where did Michael want to take Carol for the holidays?
questions.explanation:
Sandals, Jamaica.

	Michael bought two all-inclusive tickets to Jamaica to take Carol on a getaway for the holidays.  Unfortunately, Carol was freaked out by the fact that Michael had taped his own picture over her ex-husband's photo on a previous Christmas picture.  Carol ended up breaking up with Michael.

questions.text: What did Dunder Mifflin give all of the staff for Christmas?
questions.explanation:
robe.

	The main office actually was one short with their gift of robes.  Dwight took it upon himself to take Toby's away because he thought he didn't deserve one.  Pam ended up giving her robe to Toby.

questions.text: What color did Angela say was "whorish"?
questions.explanation:
orange.

	In a previous episode, Angela had said not to use green streamers for a party because they were "whorish".  However, when Phyllis asked her what was the new "whorish" color.  Angela said it was orange, which happened to be the color of shirt that Phyllis was wearing.

questions.text: Who was the official head of the office party planning committee?
questions.explanation:
Angela.

	Angela was very domineering and wouldn't listen to any suggestions that Karen or Pam made about ideas for their Christmas party.  Karen and Pam decided to form their own party committee.

questions.text: What was the name of the waitress at the Japanese steakhouse where Michael, Jim, Dwight, and Andy went to for lunch?
questions.explanation:
Cindy.

	Andy decided it would be good for Michael to get out of the office because he was so upset over his break-up with Carol.  Andy tried to get Michael to flirt with the waitress to get his mind off of Carol.

questions.text: What was the name of Karen and Pam's Christmas party?
questions.explanation:
Margarita Karaoke Christmas Party.

	Karen and Pam printed their party information on colored paper and taped it over Angela's flyers to make her mad.  They were getting back at Angela for not letting them participate in the original Christmas party.

questions.text: What was Angela's famous dessert that she made for her party?
questions.explanation:
Double Fudge Brownies.

	Kevin only came to Angela's party for the brownies.  After he heard all of the fun that everyone was having in the breakroom at the other party, he slipped away.

questions.text: Which of the following people did NOT attend Angela's party?
questions.explanation:
Creed.

	Creed, Toby, Ryan, Kelly, and Meredith never put in an appearance at Angela's party.  Phyllis, Kevin, and Hannah each left and attended Pam and Karen's party .

questions.text: What song did Kevin sing at the Karen and Pam's party?
questions.explanation:
"You Oughta Know".

	Kevin belonged to a band called Scrantanicity.  He jumped at the chance to show off his musical talents.

questions.text: Did Angela ever join Karen and Pam's party?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Karen and Pam decided in the spirit of Christmas that they would ask Angela to join their party since she was the only one left at her party.  She agreed only if she could sing Christmas songs.
